ai-tha-ap136:1.1_0: “Ānanda, got the name of the Buddha
ai-tha-ap136:1.3_0: The reciter of the middle is asked,
ai-tha-ap136:3.1_0: The Sambuddha, while walking mindfully on the path,
ai-tha-ap136:4.3_0: and all the gods, after taking them together,
ai-tha-ap136:5.1_0: as far as the city extends.
ai-tha-ap136:5.2_0: Then the Lord of the World,
ai-tha-ap136:5.3_0: by the power of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap136:5.4_0: for seven days you won’t go for seven days.
ai-tha-ap136:6.1_0: and because of that bright root:
ai-tha-ap136:6.4_0: He has crossed over the world,
ai-tha-ap136:7.2_0: as well as the five aristocrats.
ai-tha-ap136:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Scalk.
ai-tha-ap136:10.1_0: for the fourth Elder Bhaddiya flowers,
